name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior HTML Engineer, I bring a strong proficiency in **HTML**, **CSS**, **SCSS**, **UI/UX design**, and **Responsive Design** with 8 years of experience in delivering high-quality web applications. My background includes ensuring **Cross-Browser Compatibility**, maintaining **Accessibility Standards**, and leveraging modern tools like **Figma**, **Sketch**, **Photoshop**, **Sass**, and frameworks like **Bootstrap**, **Tailwind**, and **Angular** to create user-focused designs. I excel in enhancing web performance optimization and implementing seamless CSS/JS animations, utilizing automation tools such as **Gulp** and **Webpack**. 

In addition to my front-end expertise, I have a solid foundation in full-stack development using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms and integrated AI/ML capabilities into applications, bringing depth of experience in machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. I thrive in collaborative environments and prioritize attention to detail, ensuring robust, scalable solutions adhere to best practices and compliance standards.
